title: Pathology Mnemonic Collaboration Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Small-group collaborative learning environment utilizing mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively document three creative mnemonic techniques for ten types of histopathological slides
Learners can explain 20 core pathology concepts with 80% accuracy using five shared mnemonic techniques
Learners can exchange real-time mnemonic feedback three or more times using mobile collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
